Name: Axe Fletch
Description: Imbue an axe with a transformative power.
Message: The axe in your hand begins to quiver. It seems to have taken on a mind of its own.

Name: Blast
Description: Create a burst of energy.
Message: is struck with a powerful force!

Name: Breathe
Description: Bring forth air in your lungs.
Message: Your lungs are filled in an instant with a popping sound. You feel satisfied. For a while, you don't feel the need to inhale or exhale at all.

Name: Consume
Description: Consume the essence of much food at once.
Message: The food trembles and begins to swirl around you. As it fizzles away, you feel it strengthening you!

Name: Dehydrate
Description: Withdraw water from objects.
Message: You draw all the water out from the

Name: Drain
Description: Sap the life from living beings.

Name: Enchant
Description: Bring out the magical qualities of certain neckwear.

Name: Endure
Description: Prepare your body to withstand the next hit.
Message: You feel prepared to handle the next hit!

Name: Entangle
Description: Grow vines to entrap an opponent.
Message: is entangled by a magical vine!

Name: Extract
Description: Draw the essence out of items, concentrating them into magical seeds.

Name: Hypnotize
Description: Relax an opponent into a sleepy state.
Message: grows drowsy, it's doing everything it can to just stay awake!

Name: Introspect
Description: Discover more about the intrinsic qualities of an item.

Name: Lift
Description: Reduce the weight of your weapon.

Name: Lure
Description: Attract fish to yourself.
Message: Your hands begin to tremble, followed by a horrid smell.

Name: Magic Needle
Description: Conjure a self-propelled needle.
Message: The needle springs to life, quickly sewing together anything it can find in your inventory.

Name: Mind Trick
Description: Confuse your opponent.

Name: Molten Swing
Description: Infuse your pickaxe with an intense, magical heat.
Message: The pickaxe in your hand begins to glow white hot.

Name: Rain
Description: Bring about a small, localized rainstorm.
Message: The air grows thick with humidity, enveloping you in a thick fog. A sudden updraft clears your view and it begins to rain.

Name: Rally
Description: Increase your strength from your own exhaustion.
Message: Any exhaustion you have seems to melt away. You feel energized.

Name: Reflect
Description: Return attacks back to their attackers.
Message: A cold shiver runs down your torso. A dim blue glow seems to shimmer from a field around your body.

Name: Rice to Rolls
Description: Rolls non-rolled rice into rolled rice.
Message: The rice flies into the air in a flurry of grain, quickly forming spheres. Seaweed seeps out of the bottom of each roll, forming finished rolls.

Name: Teleport Branch
Description: Converts regular branches into transit branches.
Message: The branches in your inventory begin to tremble, then pop into the air with a sudden snap.

Name: Temporal Leap
Description: Let time wash over you.
Message: The world begins to blur into a fog. Reality flows past you at in incomprehensible speed. You stumble forward, a little bit older.
